name: Krak'n Cap'n
description:
Survive as long as you can while your ship slowly sinks into the clutches of the Kraken.

The longer you stand above a tentacle, the faster it grows. You can also hover to make tricky jumps, but be careful, as this causes the tentacles to grow even faster!

Controls:
Arrows to move
Spacebar to jump
Hold spacebar while jumping to hover

Created by Alex Duarte, Katelyn Eathorne, and Vitor Fiacadori
